## Is this related to a problem?
A clear description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]

## Describe the Solution
A clear description of what you want to happen.

## Describe Alternatives
Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Privacy/Security Implications
Does this feature affect privacy or security? How?

- [ ] This feature maintains zero-knowledge architecture
- [ ] This feature doesn't require server-side changes
- [ ] This feature doesn't introduce tracking/analytics

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.

## Would you like to contribute this feature?
- [ ] Yes, I'd like to submit a PR
- [ ] No, but I can help test
- [ ] No, just suggesting
